name: Classic Slots
description:
Download now and start winning today!

Classic Slots features the most realistic classic style slot machines in the app store. If you like old style Vegas slot machines, Classic Slots is your BEST CHOICE!

Features:
* Challenging other players in real-time tournaments and win HUGE bonus chips!
* JACKPOT everywhere: every slot machine has a jackpot!
* Sharing other player's luck by tapping hot balloons.
* Free chips HOURLY!
* Incredible PAYOUTS!
* AMAZING GRAPHICS!
* True VEGAS ODDS!
* FAST PLAY!
* NEW Machines added WEEKLY!
* No nonsense – JUST CLASSIC SLOTS!

- This game is intended for mature audiences.

- This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
